intro.explanation: We will guide you through a few steps that will help you get your identity profile in great shape.
intro.diffFromEmail: Please note this is different than your organizational email account, e.g., your gmail account.  Your identity profile is used for access to certain applications you will need as part of your job.

inviteExpired.explanation: That link has already expired so we sent you another email with a new link.  You should receive it within the minute.  You will not need this tab anymore.

complete.info: {0}, thank you for setting up your {1} identity profile.  You will find your updated settings on the next page and can make any adjustments from there in the future.
complete.unverifiedEmails: Look for a verification email in the following account(s) so we can confirm your password recovery options:

index.unverifiedEmails: You have unverified email addresses, please log into those accounts and click the link provided in the verification email.

passwordRecoveryCard.title: Password recovery
passwordRecoveryCard.warning: No recovery addresses at this time, please add one.
passwordRecoveryCard.unverified: This email has not yet been verified, please check its account for a verification email.

totpCard.title: Smartphone
totpCard.warning: No smartphone at this time, please add one.

u2fCard.title: USB security key
u2fCard.warning: No security key at this time, please add one.

codeCard.title: Printable backup codes
codeCard.warning: No backup codes at this time, please create some.

dndCard.title: Do not disclose
dndCard.info: When enabled, using the Forgot Password process will produce a message that your account does not exist. It will, however, still send you an email with a link you can use to reset your password.

create.header: Create a password for your {0} Identity
create.tooShort: Your new password must be at least {0} characters
create.tooLong: Your new password cannot be longer than {0} characters
create.tooWeak: Your new password must be stronger
create.goodPassword: That is a great password, nice job!

confirm.explanation: Just to make sure we both have your new password right, please enter it one more time.
confirm.noMatch: That password does not match your previous one

saved.info: Your new password has been saved.

recovery.header: What if you forget your password?
recovery.explanation: Sometimes we forget our password.  Sometimes the password we have just doesn't seem to work. In those situations, it is important to still be able to "recover" your password.
recovery.info: If you forget your password we will send an email to {0} with a link you can use to create a new password.
recovery.infoWithMgrOnly: We can also send an email to your manager at {0} with a code you can use to create a new password.
recovery.advice: In addition, we recommend you add at least one more alternate email address that you own to ensure resetting your password in the future is as easy as possible.
recovery.atLeastOneRecovery: Thankfully you already have alternate means we can use to send a special link in case you need to begin the password recovery process.  You may have as many as you like.
recovery.unsaved: You have not saved your changes yet.
recovery.dontRemoveLastOne: Please add another alternate address before removing this one.

verifyRecovery.verified: Congratulations!  You have sucessfully added that recovery method just in case you ever forget your password.
verifyRecovery.expired: Unfortunately that verification code has already expired.  I will send you another email right now with a new verification code.  You may go ahead and close this tab and check your email.
verifyRecovery.invalid: Unfortunately something is wrong with that link.  You will need to try again.

button.profile: Login and see my updated profile

forgot.clickOnly: Please click me to send a link

forgotSent.emailComing: We will send an email with a special link to the following email address in a minute:
forgotSent.alternates: If you do not currently have access to this email account, please use one of the alternates below.
forgotSent.too: Sent to this email as well

verify.verified: Congratulations!  That was the correct code, you may create your new password now.
verify.expired: Unfortunately that verification code has already expired.  I will send you another email right now with a new verification code.  You may go ahead and close this tab and check your email.
verify.invalid: Unfortunately something is wrong with that link.  You will need to try again.

complete.congrats: Your password has been changed.  You will not have complete access to your profile until you log back in with your new password.

intro.info: Before we go any further, we would like to introduce an important step in protecting your account.
If you have one and it is usually with you, this can be a very good option for your 2-Step Verification.

download.info: There are many apps you can use for this step however we recommend Google Authenticator for its simplicity.  It is also free and will not cause you to incur any data charges.

button.ok: OK, I installed it on my smartphone

scanQr.header: Connect your smartphone to your account
scanQr.info: In order to connect your smartphone to your account we will need to scan the QR code below into the app you just installed.
scanQr.add: Add an account by pressing "begin setup" or the "add" button and then choosing the "scan a barcode" option
scanQr.qr: Point your phone at the QR code below and your app will start generating 6-digit codes

button.ok: OK, my app is generating codes now

verifyQrCode.header: Verify code from your smartphone app
verifyQrCode.info: Your app will generate a new 6-digit code every 30 seconds, when you're ready enter the one displayed in your app and click "Verify".

codeVerified.info: That was the correct code so you may now use your smartphone to further protect your account.

intro.header: Do you have a USB security key?
intro.info: USB security keys are the most secure and convenient option for your 2-Step Verification setup.

button.no: No, but I'd like to get one

nosupport.info: USB security keys are only supported in the safest browsers, please consider a more secure browser like Google Chrome.

touch.header: Touch or press your USB security key
touch.info: Once your security key starts blinking, go ahead and press its button or touch its sensor.
touch.error: Something went wrong.  Please make sure you have the key inserted correctly and wait for the blink before pressing.

confirmed.info: Your USB security key is now confirmed so you may use it to further protect your account.

intro.backupInfo: There may be times when you do not have your smartphone or USB security key with you.  When that is the case, printable backup codes can be used.
intro.primaryInfo: Even if you are not using a smartphone or security key for 2-step verification you can still increase the security of your account by using printable backup codes alone.
intro.warning: some content for those users that have NOT set up other 2sv options.

change.removing: Removing it from your account now...
change.removed: That has safely been removed now.  You may add another back if you like from your profile.
